definitions.text: a heavy iron lever with one end forged into a wedge
to move or force, especially in an effort to get something open; :
examples: Raccoons managed to pry the lid off the garbage pail
Don't pry into my personal matters!

definitions.text: search or inquire in a meddlesome way
examples: This guy is always nosing around the office

definitions.text: make an uninvited or presumptuous inquiry
examples: They pried the information out of him
